nodes.text: Aurek Team ( Team) was a unit composed of SBI agents, Advanced Recon Commandos, and Jedi formed to investigate the Sith base in the Works. It was led by Mace Windu, Captain Dyne, and Clone Commander Valiant, and was the counterpart of Bacta Team.
Aurek Team, minus Windu, did manage to eventually uncover the identity of Darth Sidious, but were immediately killed by him. The Jedi assumed that they had been killed during the Battle of Coruscant.
